com.itko.lisa.remote.client

Class AgentHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.itko.lisa.remote.client.AgentHelper

  • public final class AgentHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some helper functionality for clients of the LISA agent.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  AgentHelper.ByField
      This enumeration notes the field types by which we can retrieve a service bounded transaction frame tree.

    • Method Detail

      • checkPathfinderEnvironment

        public static boolean checkPathfinderEnvironment()
        A convenience method for making sure the agent environment is OK. Checks the following:
        1. Can we get the TransactionClient object?
        2. Can we tell the broker to flush its transactions?
        3. Can we get a connection to the database?
        Returns:
        true if everything is OK, false otherwise.

      • getSourceCode

        public static java.lang.String getSourceCode(long agentId,
                             java.lang.String className)
        This method retrieves the source code for the given class name from the specified agent. Note that the agent must be alive for this to work.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the ID of the agent to get the source code from.
        className - the name of the class to get the source code for.
        Returns:
        the source code for the requested class or null if anything went wrong.

      • getAllObservedAgents

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllObservedAgents(java.sql.Date from,
                                                    java.sql.Date to)
        This method returns a list of agents (name -- not id) that were seen during the given time frame. Though the list returned may be empty, it will never be null.
        Parameters:
        from - the start date to search for.
        to - the end date to search for.
        Returns:
        a list of the names of agents observed during the specified time frame.

      • getAgentNameMap

        public static java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> getAgentNameMap()
        This method can be used to create a mapping of the ID of an agent to its name for all known agents.
        Returns:
        the map of the agent IDs to names.

      • getAgentName

        public static java.lang.String getAgentName(long id)
        THis is a helper method for looking up the name of a known agent by its ID.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID (GUID) of the agent to get the name for.
        Returns:
        the name of the agent. It is possible this may be the ID of the agent in string form.

      • getAgentStatistics

        public static java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.stats.StatsFrame> getAgentStatistics(long agentId,
                                                                       java.util.Date from,
                                                                       java.util.Date to)
        This method retrieves a list of statistics for the specified agent for the specified time period.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the ID of the agent to get statistics for.
        from - the starting point of the window to retrieve.
        to - the ending point of the windown to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the list of statistics for the agent.

      • getAllObservedServiceIPs

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllObservedServiceIPs(java.sql.Date from,
                                                        java.sql.Date to)
        This method returns a list of service IPs that were seen during the given time frame. Though the list returned may be empty, it will never be null.
        Parameters:
        from - the start date to search for.
        to - the end date to search for.
        Returns:
        a list of the service IPs observed during the specified time frame.

      • getAllObservedValues

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllObservedValues(java.lang.String column,
                                                    java.sql.Date from,
                                                    java.sql.Date to,
                                                    java.lang.String likeClause,
                                                    boolean isStringColumn)
        This method is used to retrieve a list of values which were observed within a given date range.
        Parameters:
        column - the column to retrieve.
        from - the start date to search for.
        to - the end date to search for.
        likeClause - any extra clause to add to the query.
        Returns:
        a list of the names of classes observed during the specified time frame.

      • getTransactionsClient

        public static TransactionsClient getTransactionsClient()
        This is a helper method for acquiring a transactions client. If one cannot be acquired, then null will be returned.
        Returns:
        the current transactions client.

      • findTransactionIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTransactionIds(int offset,
                                                  int limit,
                                                  java.sql.Date from,
                                                  java.sql.Date to,
                                                  java.lang.String localIPExp,
                                                  java.lang.String remoteIPExp,
                                                  int category,
                                                  java.lang.String classExp,
                                                  java.lang.String methodExp,
                                                  java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                  java.lang.String transactionId,
                                                  int minTime,
                                                  java.lang.String agentName,
                                                  boolean sortAscending,
                                                  int maxIDsToRead)
        Deprecated. 
        This method returns a list of the transaction IDs from the Pathfinder database which match the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        from - the start date of the data to search for.
        to - the end date of the data to search for.
        localIPExp - [null] where this transaction started expression, like "168.60".
        remoteIPExp - [null] where this ip expression was the service end point.
        category - [0] the frame category to search for.
        classExp - [null] expression on what class name.
        methodExp - [null] expression on what method name.
        sessionId - [null] expression on what session ID.
        transactionId - [null] where part of this transaction.
        minTime - [0] filter out those total exec times that less than this.
        agentName - [null] what agent to see.
        sortAscending - true to sort results ascending by time, false to sort descending.
        maxIDsToRead - limits the number of transaction IDs read from the database.
        Returns:
        the list of matching transaction IDs.

      • findTransactionIds

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> findTransactionIds(int offset,
                                                  int limit,
                                                  java.sql.Date from,
                                                  java.sql.Date to,
                                                  java.lang.String localIPExp,
                                                  java.lang.String remoteIPExp,
                                                  int category,
                                                  java.lang.String classExp,
                                                  java.lang.String methodExp,
                                                  java.lang.String sessionId,
                                                  java.lang.String transactionId,
                                                  int minTime,
                                                  java.lang.String agentName,
                                                  java.util.Map tags,
                                                  boolean sortAscending,
                                                  int maxIDsToRead)
        This method returns a list of the transaction IDs from the Pathfinder database which match the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        from - the start date of the data to search for.
        to - the end date of the data to search for.
        localIPExp - [null] where this transaction started expression, like "168.60".
        remoteIPExp - [null] where this ip expression was the service end point.
        category - [0] the frame category to search for.
        classExp - [null] expression on what class name.
        methodExp - [null] expression on what method name.
        sessionId - [null] expression on what session ID.
        transactionId - [null] where part of this transaction.
        minTime - [0] filter out those total exec times that less than this.
        agentName - [null] what agent to see.
        sortAscending - true to sort results ascending by time, false to sort descending.
        maxIDsToRead - limits the number of transaction IDs read from the database.
        Returns:
        the list of matching transaction IDs.

      • getServiceBoundedTree

        public static com.itko.lisa.remote.client.utils.ServiceBoundaryTransactionFrameFilter getServiceBoundedTree(java.lang.String id,
                                                                                            AgentHelper.ByField byField)
        This method is used to retrieve a transaction frame tree which has been processed to service boundaries.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the desired frame (either frame or transaction ID).
        byField - a notation as to which field is represented by the id argument.
        Returns:
        the service boundary filter used which will contain the processed information or null if no data could be found.

      • findFrame

        public static TransactionFrame findFrame(TransactionFrame frame,
                         java.lang.String frameId)
        This is a helper method which will recursively search a transaction frame tree for one known by the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        frame - the frame to search.
        frameId - the ID of the desired frame.
        Returns:
        the frame known by the given ID.

      • importTransactions

        public static void importTransactions(java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.client.utils.ServiceBoundaryTransactionFrameFilter> paths,
                      java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.client.utils.ServiceBoundaryTransactionFrameFilter> skipped,
                      java.util.Map<java.lang.Long,java.lang.String> agentMap,
                      java.io.InputStream inputStream,
                      boolean persist)
                               throws com.itko.lisa.remote.utils.InvalidImportFileException
        This method is used to import transactions from an uploaded zip file.
        Parameters:
        paths - the list of compressed transaction frames which were successfully imported.
        skipped - the list of compressed transaction frames which were not successfully imported.
        agentMap - the map in which we should store agent ID to name mappings.
        inputStream - the stream to ready the zip file from.
        persist - a flag indicating whether importing should persist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        com.itko.lisa.remote.utils.InvalidImportFileException

                    java.lang.String owner,
                    boolean persist)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to import recordings from an uploaded zip file.
        Parameters:
        recordingList - the list of recordings which were successfully imported.
        inputStream - the stream to ready the zip file from.
        owner - current user who is importing the recording.
        persist - a flag indicating whether importing should persist.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        This method creates a zip file (written to the outputStream) containing the exported recordings specified by the recording names in the recordingNames list.
        Parameters:

        outputStream - the output stream to write to.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • exportTransactions

        public static void exportTransactions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> roots,
                      java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
        This method creates a zip file (written to the outputStream) containing the exported transactions specified by the parents in the roots list.
        Parameters:
        roots - the list of root frame IDs to export.
        outputStream - the output stream to write to.

      • getTicketsClient

        public static TicketsClient getTicketsClient()
        This is a helper method for acquiring a tickets client. If one cannot be acquired, then null will be returned.
        Returns:
        the current tickets client.

      • getTickets

        public static int getTickets(java.util.List<com.itko.lisa.remote.capture.Ticket> tickets,
             int offset,
             int limit,
             java.sql.Date from,
             java.sql.Date to,
             int status,
             java.lang.String ticketId,
             java.lang.String defectId,
             java.lang.String component,
             java.lang.String title,
             java.lang.String customer,
             java.lang.String reporter)
        This is a helper method for retrieving a list of tickets based on the search criteria provided.
        Parameters:
        tickets - the list to add our retrieved tickets to.
        offset - the offset of the first ticket we want back.
        limit - the limit on the number of tickets to return.
        from - the first date to use in the filter.
        to - the last date to use in the filter.
        status - the ticket status to search for.
        ticketId - the ID of the ticket to search for.
        defectId - the defect ID to search for.
        component - component to search for.
        title - the title to search for.
        customer - the customer to search for.
        reporter - the reporter to search for.
        Returns:
        the total number of tickets the query returned. Note that this is not necessarily the same as the number of objects returned in the tickets argument; the number of objects will be bounded by limit.

      • getTicket

        public static com.itko.lisa.remote.capture.Ticket getTicket(java.lang.String ticketId)
        This method retrieves the ticket specified by the ticket ID parameter.
        Parameters:
        ticketId - the ID of the ticket to return.
        Returns:
        the retrieved ticket object.

        This method is used to retrieve the statistics data for the specified ticket.
        Parameters:
        ticketId - the ID of the ticket to get the statistics frames for.
        Returns:
        the list of statistics frames associated with the ticket.

      • updateTicket

        public static com.itko.lisa.remote.capture.Ticket updateTicket(java.lang.String ticketId,
                                               java.lang.String component,
                                               java.lang.String defectId,
                                               java.lang.String description,
                                               java.lang.String reporterEmail,
                                               int severity,
                                               int status,
                                               java.lang.String title)
        This method updates the ticket specified by the ticket ID parameter with the given values.
        Parameters:
        ticketId - the ID of the ticket to update.
        component - the component for the ticket.
        defectId - the defect ID for the ticket.
        description - the ticket's description.
        reporterEmail - the e-mail address of the reporter.
        severity - the defect severity.
        status - the status for the ticket.
        title - the title for the ticket.
        Returns:
        the updated ticket object.

      • getAllTicketReporters

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getAllTicketReporters()
        This method is used to retrieve a list of anyone that has submitted a ticket.
        Returns:
        the list of all known ticket reporters.

      • getScreenShotForTicket

        public static byte[] getScreenShotForTicket(java.lang.String ticketId)
        This method is used to retrieve the screen shot for a given ticket. The array returned will never be null but will be of zero length if a screen shot cannot be retrieved.
        Parameters:
        ticketId - the ID of the ticket to get the screen shot for.
        Returns:
        the byte[] which represents the screen shot.

      • toggleTransactionRecording

        public static boolean toggleTransactionRecording(long agentId)
        This method is used to toggle the transaction recording on the agent. If the agent is currently recording, and this method id called, the agent will stop recording. If the agent is not recording and this method is called, the agent will start recording.
        Parameters:
        agentId - the ID of the agent to toggle recording on.
        Returns:
